dialogue: Interesting angle. I've never seen myself like that before. It’s almost...artsy. What do you think, Emma?
Um, um, oh! Yes, sir. Yess...
She sounds distracted, for some reason.
I had her take them off! They were chafing.
They're – oh! – in my pocket, Quinn.
Why don't you take them, lad?
Success! I'm holding Emma’s still-warm panties in my hand.
If I didn't only have the day, I’d have taken them into the bathroom, and used them while looking at the photo I just showed my boss..
